data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 16,740 believers in Tambov, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tambov, Russia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 642,050 cultural Christians in the state of Tambov to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Tambov with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: the state of Tambov has (about) 16,740 people who know Jesus, 642,050 people who know about him culturally, and 485,109 people who are far from Jesus.
Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Altai people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Tambov, Russia to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,127,159 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Tambov, Russia.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Tambov, Russia has a population of 1,143,900.

We estimate Tambov has 16,740 people who might know Jesus, 642,050 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 485,109 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Tambov to agree with you and with one another.
